definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: bear, bring forth, beget (NH id.; Aram. [[יְלִיד]], [[יְלֵיד]], yiled; Ar. walada bear, bring forth, so Eth. walada: As. alâdu, COT:Gloss)—
bear, bring froth:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: (a mother a child,) so commonly, c. 208 t.; sq. acc. Ge 3:16, Ge 4:1 & constantly; acc. om. Ge 6:2 etc. = be delivered of a child, 1Ki 3:17, 1Ki 3:18, 2Ki 19:3 = Is 37:3 (in proverb c. neg., i.e. human power exhausted); of animals Ge 30:39, Ge 31:8, Ge 31:8, Je 14:5, Je 17:11 (bird laying eggs, or hatching out young), Ez Eze 31:6, Job 39:1, Job 39:2; but also of whole process of labour (cf. [[חול]]) [[וַתְּקַשׁ בְּלִדְתָּהּ]] Ge 35:16 cf. v:Ge 35:17, Ge 38:27, Ge 38:28, cf. 1Sa 14:19, Je 31:18, Mic 5:2 (of a man, as preposterous, Je 30:6, cf. Moses as mother of Israel Nu 11:12).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: hence in simile of distress Mic 4:9, Mic 4:10, Is 13:8, Is 21:3, Is 42:14, Je 6:24, Je 13:21, Je 22:23, Je 30:6, Je 49:24, Je 50:43, Ps 48:7, cf. Ho 13:13; [[ילד על־ברכים]] (Sta:ZAW 1886, 143 ff.) Ge 30:3, Ge 50:23 (cf. Job 3:12).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: fig. of wicked [[וְהָרָה עָמָל וְיׇלַד שָָׁקֶר]] Ps 7:15 cf. Job 15:35 also Is 33:11; of Israelites, bringing froth wind (of vain efforts for deliverance) Is 26:18; [[כְּפׂר שָׁמַיִם מִי וְלָדוֹ]] Job 38:29; of Tyre as mother of her inhabitants Is 23:4 of Jerus. Is 51:18, Is 54:1, Is 66:7, Is 66:8, Ez Eze 16:20; Isr. bearing disloyal children Ho 5:7; Jerus. and Sam., as Oholibah and Oholah Ez Eze 23:37; of Babylon Je 50:12; of a day, as producing events [[לאׁ־תֵדַע מַה יֵּ֫לֶד יוֹם]] Pr 27:1; perh. of God (fig. of rock [[חוּר]]), as mother of Isr. bringing forth with labour De 32:18 yet v.
less often beget:

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: beget, fig. Ps 2:7 of ´[[י]]'s formally installing king into theocratic rights.
Zec 13:3, Zec 13:3, of both parents (lit.); Pt. pass. 3 t. = child 1Ki 3:26, 1Ki 3:27 where mother is named, 1Ch 14:4 where father named. †

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[נוֹלַד]] 1Ch 2:3 + 6 t. + [[הנּוֹלַד־]] Ge 21:3 acc. to points, but rd. Pt. (v. Di); [[נוּ֠לְּדוּ]] Ge 3:5, Ge 20:8 (cf. Ol:§ 70, 2, R. 5); Impf. [[יִוׇּלֵד]] Ge 17:17 + 4 t.; [[יִוׇּ֑לֶד]] Is 66:8; [[וַיִּוָּלֵד]] Ge 4:18 + 2 t., etc.; Inf. [[הִוׇּ֑לֶד]] Ge 21:5; [[הִוׇּֽלְדוֹ]] Ec 7:1; [[הִוׇּלְֽדָהּ]] Ho 2:5; Pt. [[נוֹלָד]] 1Ki 13:2 + 3 t. (Ge 21:3 v. supr.); [[נוֹלָדִים]] Ge 48:5, 1Ch 7:21; —be born: of human beings, sq. [[לְ]] (born to such and such a man), Ge 4:18, Ge 10:1, Ge 17:17, Ge 21:3, Ge 21:5, Ge 46:20, Ge 48:5, Nu 26:60, De 23:9, 2Sa 3:2 (Qr), 2Sa 5:13, 2Sa 14:27, 1Ch 2:3, 1Ch 2:9, 1Ch 3:1, 1Ch 3:4, 1Ch 3:5, 1Ch 20:6, 1Ch 20:8, 1Ch 22:9, 1Ch 26:6, Job 1:2 cf. 1Ki 13:2; without [[לְ]], Job 3:3, Job 38:21, Ps 78:6, 1Ch 7:21, Ec 7:1 ([[טוֹב שֵׁם מִשֶּׁמֶן טוֹב]] :[[וְיוֹם הַמָּוֶת מִיּוֹם הִוׇּדֽוֹ]]); metaph. of Israel (under fig. of unfaithful wife) Ho 2:5; of nation, [[גּוֹי]], Is 66:8; people, [[עַם]], Ps 22:32; of animals Le 22:27, De 15:19; Pt. [[כָּל־נׇשִׁים וְהַנּוֹלָד מֵהֶם]] Ezr 10:3; c. pred. or appos. on which emph. rests, [[רָָשׁ]] ´[[נ]] Ec 4:14 he was born poor; [[אׂהֵב הָרֵָע וְאָח לְחָרָה יִוָּלֵד]] Pr 17:17; [[עַיִר פרא]] [[אדם יִוׇּלֵד]] Job 11:12, Job 15:7. †

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Inf. [[יַלֶּדְכֶם]] Ex 1:16 Pt. abs. [[מְיַלֶּדֶת]] Ge 35:17 + 2 t.; pl. abs. [[מְיִלְּדוֹת]] Ex 1:15 + 5 t. in Ex 1; —cause (or help) to bring forth, viz., assist or tend as midwife Ex 1:16 sq. acc.; elsewh. only Pt. f. as subst. = midwife; Ge 35:17 (E), Ge 38:28 (J), Ex 1:15, Ex 1:17, Ex 1:18, Ex 1:19, Ex 1:19, Ex 1:20, Ex 1:21 (E). †

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. [[יֻלַּד]] Ge 4:26 + 13 t.; [[יוּלַּד]] Ju Jdg 18:29; [[יֻלָּד]] Ge 41:50; [[יוּלָָּד]] Job 5:7; [[יֻלְּדוּ]] Ge 6:1 + 4 t. + 2Sa 3:2 Kt (Qr [[וַיִּוׇּֽלְדוּ]]); [[יֻלָָּדוּ]] Ps 90:2, etc.; Pt. (? cf. Kö:i. 433; Ges:§ 52, 2, R. 6) [[הַיוּלָּד]] Ju Jdg 13:8 (Bö:ii. p. 244 pass. Qal); i. q. Niph. be born, sq. [[לְ]] of father Ge 4:26, Ge 6:1, Ge 10:21, Ge 10:25, Ge 24:15 (all J), Ge 41:50 (E), Ge 35:26, Ge 36:5, Ge 46:22, Ge 46:27 (all P), Ju Jdg 18:29, 2Sa 3:2, 2Sa 3:5, 2Sa 21:20, 2Sa 21:22, 1Ch 1:19, Je 20:15; sq. [[לְ]] before grandmother's name Ru 4:17 cf. [[לָ֫נוּ]] Is 9:5; sq. [[לְ]] of purpose, destiny, [[אדם לעמל יוּלָּדָ]] Job 5:7; [[יֻלְּדוּ]] [[עַל־בִּרְכֵת יוֹסֵף]] Ge 50:23 (E; Sam. ´[[בִּימֵי יו]], cit. Di) denoting recognition of children as his; no prep. Je 20:14, Je 22:26, cf. Ju Jdg 13:8 (v. supr.); fig. of foreigners incorporated in spiritual Zion Ps 87:4, Ps 87:5, Ps 87:6; of production of mountains Ps 90:2.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הוֹלִיד]] Ge 11:27 +; [[הוֹלִד]] Nu 26:58; [[הׂלִיד]] 1Ch 2:36 +; sf. [[וְהוֹלִידָהּ]] consec. Is 55:10; [[הוֹלַדְ֫תָּ]] Ge 48:6, etc.; Impf. [[יוֹלִיד]] Ge 17:20, Ec 6:3; [[וַיּ֫וֹלֶד]] Ge 5:3 +; 2 ms. [[תּוֹלִיד]] De 4:25 + 4 t.; [[אוֹלִיד]] Is 66:9; Imv. [[הוֹלִי֫דוּ]] Je 29:6; Inf. abs. [[הוֹלֵיד]] Is 59:4; cstr. sf. [[הוֹלִידוֹ]] Ge 5:4 + 16 t.; Pt. [[מוֹלִיד]] Is 66:9; [[מוֹלִדִים]] Je 16:3; —
beget (a father a child) Ge 5:3, Ge 5:4, Ge 5:4 + 56 t. in Gn., Le 25:45, Nu 26:29, Nu 26:58 (all these P, v. sub

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: ) + De 4:25, De 28:41 (v. Di), 1Ch 2:10, 1Ch 2:10, 1Ch 2:11, 1Ch 2:11 + 84 t. Chr.; Ru 4:18 + 8 t., Ju Jdg 11:1, 2Ki 20:18 = Is 39:7, Je 29:6, Ez Eze 18:10, Eze 18:14, Eze 47:22, Ec 5:13, Ec 6:3, cf. Is 45:10; also Je 16:3 [[אֲבוֹתָם הַמּוֹלִדִים]] [[אוֹתָם]], cf. freq. Assyr. abu banu§a, e.g. VR Je 1:8; fig. of producing dewdrops Job 38:28; of causing the earth to bear grain Is 55:10, causing Zion to bring forth Is 66:9.
bear, only fig. Is 59:4 (‖[[הָרוֹ]]), of wicked, bringing forth iniquity (this favoured by context others, beget). †

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Inf. [[חֻלֶּ֫דֶת]] Ge 40:20, Ez Eze 16:5; [[הוּלֶּ֫דֶת]] Ez Eze 16:4 (Co as foregoing); only [[אֶת־]] ´[[יוֹם ה]] Ge 40:20, Ez Eze 16:4, 16:5 day of one's being born = birthday. †

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. [[וַיִּתְיִלְּדוּ]] Nu 1:18 denom. fr. [[תולדת]] declared their pedigree (v. Di).
